mapper.select: select DEPT_CODE as deptCode, DEPE_NAME as depeName, DEPT_SHORT as deptShort, DEPT_DESC as deptDesc, DEPT_ROOT as deptRoot, BRANCH_LEVEL as branchLevel, REMARK1, REMARK2, BRANCH_LEADER as branchLeader, WXBM_CODE as wxbmCode, TXLQX, ROLE_QX as roleQx, IS_HAS_QX as isHasQx, ROOM_CODE as roomCode, COM_ID as comId, DEL_FLG as delFlg, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Branch where DEL_FLG="0" order by BRANCH_LEVEL

select DEPT_CODE as deptCode, DEPE_NAME as depeName, DEPT_SHORT as deptShort, DEPT_DESC as deptDesc, DEPT_ROOT as deptRoot, BRANCH_LEVEL as branchLevel, REMARK1, REMARK2, BRANCH_LEADER as branchLeader, WXBM_CODE as wxbmCode, TXLQX, ROLE_QX as roleQx, IS_HAS_QX as isHasQx, ROOM_CODE as roomCode, COM_ID as comId, DEL_FLG as delFlg, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Branch where DEPE_NAME=#{depeName} and DEL_FLG="0"

select DEPT_CODE, DEPE_NAME, DEPT_SHORT, DEPT_DESC, DEPT_ROOT, BRANCH_LEVEL, REMARK1, REMARK2, BRANCH_LEADER, WXBM_CODE, TXLQX, ROLE_QX, IS_HAS_QX, ROOM_CODE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_Branch where DEL_FLG = "0" and BRANCH_LEVEL < 3
